name: The Lives and Deaths of Mr. Snuggles
name_original: The Lives and Deaths of Mr. Snuggles
description:
Mr. Snuggles finds himself in a strange and inhospitable place: Purgatory.  But parts of it seem familiar. Help Mr. Snuggles reconnect with his nine lives (or at least seven of them), so he can make move on.

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2021

Bonanzaa: Programming
Lurdan: Programming
Olaf Meissner: Game Design and Project Management
Toska: Art
